items.title: Power outage hits Channel Tunnel as Eurostar urges passengers to postpone travel
items.description: Le Shuttle has also had to suspend services between Folkestone and Calais over a "power supply issue".

items.title: Blue Origin astronaut reveals depression after 'tsunami of harassment'
items.description: Blue Origin's all-female crew, which included scientist Amanda Nguyen, was launched into space in April.

items.title: Johnson to decide future after Palace deal agreed
items.description: Brennan Johnson is set decide whether he wants to join Crystal Palace after the south London club agreed a Â£35m deal to sign the Tottenham attacker.

items.title: Ukraine denies drone attack on Putin's residence
items.description: Russia has accused Ukraine of targeting a presidential residence, which President Zelensky called "typical Russian lies".

items.title: French right pushes for national tribute to film star Brigitte Bardot
items.description: A petition for a national homage to Brigitte Bardot - who died on Sunday - attracts more than 23,000 signatures.
